mapper.insert: insert into member_info(member_name , id, pw, email,gender,age ) values(#{member_name}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{age} )
mapper.select:
select md_info.barcode_no,md_name, price, promotion_no, pr_type, pr_ea, pr_subject, pr_content, pr_family, pr_price
from md_info join md_price on md_info.md_no = md_price.md_no left join promotion on md_info.barcode_no = promotion.barcode_no where md_info.barcode_no=#{barcode_no};
mapper.insert:
insert into pos_board( store_no, pos_no, list_no , barcode_no, md_ea, sale_price, type, sale_date,sale_time) values(
(select count(*) as cnt from auto_increment_info list_no where store_no = 1), #{pos_no},
(select count(*) as cnt from auto_increment_info list_no where list_no = 1),
#{barcode_no},#{md_ea},#{sale_price}, #{type}, sysdate(),curtime());
mapper.select:
SELECT pos_board.list_no ,list_md_ea ,total_price ,pos_board.type ,pos_board.sale_date ,pos_board.sale_time FROM md_info JOIN md_price ON md_info.md_no = md_price.md_no JOIN pos_board ON md_info.barcode_no = pos_board.barcode_no join (SELECT list_no, sum((price-sale_price)*md_ea) total_price, sum(md_ea) list_md_ea FROM md_info JOIN md_price ON md_info.md_no = md_price.md_no JOIN pos_board ON md_info.barcode_no = pos_board.barcode_no group by list_no ) total on total.list_no = pos_board.list_no where sale_date = #{sale_date} group by pos_board.list_no ,pos_board.sale_date ,list_md_ea ,pos_board.type ,total_price ,sale_date ,sale_time
order by pos_board.list_no desc;
select * from md_info where md_name like concat('%',#{md_name},'%') or barcode_no = #{md_name};
mapper.update: update functionkey_info set md_name = #{md_name}, barcode_no = #{barcode_no} where key_no = #{key_no};
mapper.select:
select key_no, md_name, barcode_no from ( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, key_no, md_name, barcode_no from (select @rownum:=0) as rownum, functionkey_info) functionkey_info
where rownum > (#{pageNum}-1)*16 and rownum <= #{pageNum}*16
select * from tel_membership_info where tel_company=#{tel_company} and phone_no = #{phone_no};
